title: Topic 001 Question 050
body: Your team is running a Cloud SQL for MySQL instance with a 5 TB database that must be available 24/7. You need to save database backups on object storage with minimal operational overhead or risk to your production workloads. What should you do?
options: Create a read replica, and then use the mysqldump utility to export each table.
Clone the Cloud SQL instance, and then use the mysqldump utlity to export the data.
Use the mysqldump utility on the primary database instance to export the backup.
